title: Nebula Floater
summaries: The Nebula Floater is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist flying enemy that spawns near the Nebula Pillar during the Lunar Events. It periodically spawns up to three Nebula Eyes that float around it. If it has a clear line of sight to the player, it will hover in place and start firing pink Nebula Lasers from one of the Nebula Eyes at the player, otherwise it will move towards player through all tiles. It can also do random teleports around the player periodically, and will attempt to do so more frequently if it is hurt.

statistics.Damage:
75/150/225 (melee)
130200300 (Nebula Laser)
statistics.Max Life: 1300/2600/3900
statistics.KB Resist: 50%/55%/60%
